+Forget.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Forget ailment

+Paralyze.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Paralyze ailment

+Poison.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Poison ailment

+Stone.effect: Physical attacks may inflict the Petrify ailment

Agi.effect: Inflicts light Fire damage on one enemy

Agidyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Fire damage on one enemy

Alter Pain.effect: Team members regenerate a small amount of MP relative to the damage they have taken

Amrita.effect: Cures all ailments on all team members

Anger Hit.effect: Guaranteed critical hit on one enemy, but 50% accuracy

Anti-Ailment.effect: Reduces chances of suffering from any ailment

Anti-All.effect: Resists damage from all attacks and Curse-based ailments except Almighty attacks

Anti-Almighty.effect: Reduces damage taken from Almighty attacks

Anti-Curse.effect: Resists damage from Curse attacks, reduces chance of suffering from Curse-based ailments

Anti-Most.effect: Resists damage from all attacks and Curse-based ailments except for Physical and Almighty attacks

Assassinate.effect: Inflicts heavy Physical damage on enemy team leader and ignores defense modifiers from presence of team members

Attack All.effect: Regular attack hits all enemies. Compatible with Double Strike and Ultimate Hit

Attack from Blind Spot.effect: Inflicts damage to one enemy of any physical or magic element, whichever is more effective. Inflicts Shock

Avenge.effect: High chance of retaliating when struck with a physical attack

Ban Curse.effect: Cancels the first Curse attack during the skirmish

Ban Elec.effect: Cancels the first Elec attack during the skirmish

Ban Fire.effect: Cancels the first Fire attack during the skirmish

Ban Force.effect: Cancels the first Force attack during the skirmish

Ban Ice.effect: Cancels the first Ice attack during the skirmish

Ban Phys.effect: Cancels the first Physical attack during the skirmish

Barrier.effect: Casts Makarakarn at the start of the skirmish

Battle Aura.effect: Blocks all attacks that do 50 damage or less per hit

Berserk.effect: Inflicts HP-dependent Physical damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Black Courier.effect: User takes a hit for an ally if they have better resistance to that attack

Brutal Hit.effect: Inflicts HP-dependent Physical damage on one enemy

Bufu.effect: Inflicts light Ice damage on one enemy

Bufudyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Ice damage on one enemy

Coiste-Bohhar.effect: Greatly increases speed during a skirmish

Counter.effect: Low chance of retaliating when struck with a physical attack

Crit Up.effect: Increases damage dealt by critical hits

Death Call.effect: Instantly kills all enemies suffering from Poison, Paralyze, Stone, or Charm ailment

Deathbound.effect: Inflicts HP/Level/Vitality-dependent Physical damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Debilitate.effect: Enemy hit rate, evasion, and defense -25%

Demon Dance.effect: Inflicts Curse damage to random targets equal to about 25% of the target's current HP. Hits 2-5 times, max 3 times on one enemy

Desperation.effect: Team gains speed bonus in battle, but loses all initial Extra Turns

Dia.effect: Restores a small amount of HP to one team member

Diarahan.effect: Restores all HP to one team member

Diarama.effect: Restores a moderate amount of HP to one team member

Do you wanna be crushed?.effect: Increases the damage done by the user's next attack. Wears off once skirmish ends

Double Strike.effect: Converts regular attack into Double Strike, which hits its target(s) twice, though with reduced power. If combined with Ultimate Hit, the attack becomes Twin Ultimate. Compatible with Attack All and Ultimate Hit

Drain.effect: Steals HP and MP from one enemy

Drain Hit.effect: Physical hits restore HP equal to 25% of damage done

Dream Eater.effect: Steals a large amount of MP from one enemy

Dual Shadow.effect: 25% chance of the character repeating the attack they just performed

Elec Dance.effect: Inflicts Magic-relative Electric damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Endure.effect: Withstand one mortal blow once per skirmish with 1 HP remaining

Excharge.effect: Offense +50% during Extra Turn or Double Extra

Extra Bonus.effect: Increases chance of removing Extra Turns. Neutral-hitting attacks by the user may randomly gain or remove Extra Turns

Extra Cancel.effect: Inflicts light Physical damage on one enemy, removes its Extra Turn, and bestows an Extra Turn to the user if the target had an Extra Turn

Extra One.effect: The character always has an Extra Turn in battle

Extra Zero.effect: All skills are free during Extra Turn or Double Extra

Fatal Strike.effect: Inflicts heavy unavoidable Physical damage on one enemy, but cannot kill it unless it has 1 HP

Final Hit.effect: Reduces user's HP to 1, then inflicts that much Almighty damage on one enemy

Fire Dance.effect: Inflicts Magic-relative Fire damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Force Dance.effect: Inflicts Magic-relative Force damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Full Might.effect: Casts Might Call at the start of the skirmish

Gigajama.effect: High chance of inflicting Forget ailment to one enemy

Grace.effect: Casts Prayer at the start of the skirmish if any team members are heavily injured or suffering from an ailment

Grimoire.effect: Greatly increases chance of inflicting status ailments

Hassohappa.effect: Inflicts HP-dependent Physical damage on all enemies

Healing.effect: Casts Media at the start of the skirmish if any team members are injured

Health Save.effect: HP costs for both teams reduced by 75%

Hero Soul.effect: User takes a hit for the leader if they have better resistance to that attack

Hidden Strength.effect: When user is low on HP, physical offense +50%

Holy Blessing.effect: Restores HP upon landing a critical hit

Holy Dance.effect: Inflicts Magic-relative Almighty damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Holy Strike.effect: Inflicts Strength-relative Almighty damage on one enemy

I hate violence!.effect: Guaranteed critical hit on one enemy

Ice Dance.effect: Inflicts Magic-relative Ice damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times total, max 3 times on one enemy

Ignore Defense.effect: Physical attacks cannot be resisted, nullified, or absorbed

Inferno.effect: Inflicts heavy Fire damage on self, allies and enemies

Informant.effect: Reduces chance of character's Extra Turns being removed

Invincible Bartender.effect: Withstand one mortal blow once per skirmish with 1 HP remaining

Judgement.effect: Inflicts Curse damage on all enemies equal to about half their current HP

Kinetic Vision.effect: When a team member dodges an attack, all team members have a 50% bonus to all stats for the rest of the skirmish

Knight Soul.effect: User takes a lethal hit for the leader

Leader Soul.effect: If a team member would take a mortal blow, and the damage is less than the leader's current HP, the equipping leader will take the hit instead. Cannot be set onto demons

Life Aid.effect: 10% max HP is restored at the end of every skirmish

Life Drain.effect: Steals HP from one enemy. Power increases at lower HP

Life Lift.effect: 20% max HP is restored at the end of every skirmish

Mabufu.effect: Inflicts light Ice damage on all enemies

Mabufudyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Ice damage on all enemies

Magic Yang.effect: MP costs for both teams halved

Magic Yin.effect: Magic damage by team +50%, but MP costs are doubled and Physical attacks cannot be made

Makarakarn.effect: Reflects one non-Almighty magic attack for each team member

Mana Aid.effect: 10% max MP is restored at the end of every skirmish

Maragi.effect: Inflicts light Fire damage on all enemies

Maragidyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Fire damage on all enemies

Marin Karin.effect: High chance of inflicting Charm ailment to one enemy

Mazan.effect: Inflicts light Force damage on all enemies

Mazandyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Force damage on all enemies

Mazio.effect: Inflicts light Electric damage on all enemies

Maziodyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Electric damage on all enemies

Media.effect: Restores some HP to all team members

Mediarahan.effect: Restores all HP to all team members

Megido.effect: Inflicts moderate Almighty damage on all enemies

Megidolaon.effect: Inflicts heavy Almighty damage on all enemies

Might Call.effect: Guarantees a critical hit for the next Physical attack done by each team member

Mighty Hit.effect: Guaranteed critical hit on one enemy

Moneybags.effect: Team gains 20% more Macca after each skirmish

Mow Down.effect: Inflicts moderate Physical damage on all enemies

Multi-Hit.effect: Inflicts light Physical damage to one enemy 2-7 times. Number of hits depends on how much more Agility the user has than the target

Multi-Strike.effect: Inflicts light Physical damage to all enemies 2-7 times. Number of hits depends on how much more Agility the user has than the target

Nigayomogi.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Poison ailment to all enemies

Null Auto.effect: Prevents enemy Auto Skills from activating

Null Curse.effect: Provides immunity to Curse attacks and Curse-based ailments

Paladin Soul.effect: User takes a hit for the leader while also suffering half damage

Paral Eyes.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Paralyze ailment to all enemies

Petra Eyes.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Petrify ailment to all enemies

Pierce.effect: Physical attacks cannot be resisted, nullified, or absorbed

Piercing Hit.effect: Inflicts moderate Physical damage on one enemy. Cannot be resisted, nulled, or absorbed

Power Charge.effect: Increases the damage done by the user's next attack. Wears off once skirmish ends

Power Hit.effect: Inflicts heavy Physical damage on one enemy

Prayer.effect: Restores all HP and cures all ailments on all team members

Preserve Extra.effect: Reduces chance of character's Extra Turns being removed. Neutral-hitting attacks by the user may randomly gain or remove Extra Turns

Race-D.effect: Damage taken from an opponent of the same race as the character -50%

Race-O.effect: Damage done to an opponent of the same race as the character +50%

Rage Soul.effect: Doubles damage output, but normal attack can only be selected

Recarm.effect: Revives one fallen ally with about 170 HP

Recarmloss.effect: Revives fallen team members, fully restores team's HP, and cures all ailments, but reduces caster's HP to 1

Rejuvenate.effect: Casts Diarahan on a heavily injured team member at the start of the skirmish

Retaliate.effect: Moderate chance of retaliating when struck with a physical attack

Revive.effect: Casts Recarm on any fallen team members at the start of the skirmish

Samarecarm.effect: Revives one fallen ally with full HP

Sexy Gaze.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Charm ailment to all enemies

Shadow Scythe.effect: Inflicts damage to all enemies, ignoring all resistances except for Repel

Shadow Shield.effect: Blocks non-Almighty attacks for all allies, including Pierce-enhanced attacks

Shield All.effect: Blocks one non-Almighty attack for each team member, including Pierce-enhanced attacks

Shield All EX.effect: Casts Shield All at the start of the skirmish

Snipe.effect: Inflicts light unavoidable Physical damage on one enemy

Strengthen.effect: Neutralizes all elemental weaknesses within the team

Sweet Talk.effect: Moderate chance of inflicting Charm ailment to all enemies

Swift Step.effect: Greatly increases speed during a skirmish

Taunt.effect: Enemies will target user, but user will receive less damage

Tetrakarn.effect: Reflects one Physical attack for each team member

That Substantial Shadow.effect: Reduces chances of suffering from any ailment

Then just die.effect: Inflicts damage of a random element

This is not murder.effect: Inflicts heavy unavoidable Physical damage on one enemy, but cannot kill it unless it has 1 HP

Ultimate Hit.effect: Converts regular attack to Ultimate Hit, which is Almighty-attributed. If combined with Double Strike, the attack becomes Twin Ultimate. Compatible with Double Strike and Attack All

Victory Cry.effect: 25% max HP and 13% max MP is restored at the end of every skirmish

Vigilant.effect: Character gains 96% (Demons gain 80%) of EXP earned by the main character when not assigned to a team; Character gains 120% EXP when deployed in combat

Wall.effect: Casts Tetrakarn at the start of the skirmish

Watchful.effect: Character gains a small additional portion of EXP earned by the main character while not assigned to a team

Weak Kill.effect: Inflicts moderate Physical damage on one enemy with increased power if the target is suffering from an ailment

Zan.effect: Inflicts light Force damage on one enemy

Zandyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Force damage on one enemy

Zio.effect: Inflicts light Electric damage on one enemy

Ziodyne.effect: Inflicts heavy Electric damage on one enemy
